meanings.definition: A hybrid between a domestic cat and a wild cat.
meanings.sent1: The catalo had the stripes of a wild cat and the meow of a domestic cat.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper explained that the catalo was a mix of two different types of cats.
meanings.sent3: The catalo's playful antics made everyone wonder if it had inherited the wild side from its ancestors.
meanings.sent4: Seeing the catalo roam freely, it was as if nature had blended the two cat species into one unique creature.
meanings.sent5: Children visiting the zoo were amazed by the catalo's unusual appearance.

meanings.definition: A catalog or list of items for sale or reference.
meanings.sent1: I used the catalo to find the book I wanted in the library.
meanings.sent2: The catalo at the store helped customers quickly locate the products they needed.
meanings.sent3: When the catalo was misplaced, it caused confusion among the shoppers.
meanings.sent4: The online catalo made browsing for new clothes so much easier.
meanings.sent5: The catalo on the website was updated regularly with the latest items in stock.
